import React from 'react'; import api from '../../utils/Api.js' function Main (props) { const [userName, setUserName] = React.useState(false); const [userDescription, setUserDescription] = React.useState(false); const [userAvatar, setUserAvatar] = React.useState(false); const [cards, setCards] = React.useState([]); React.useEffect(() => { Promise.all([api.getUserInfo(), api.getInitialCards()]) .then(([userData, cardData]) => { setUserName(userData.name); setUserDescription(userData.about); setUserAvatar(userData.avatar); cards.forEach((card) => { setCards( )})}) .catch((error) => console.log(error)); }, []) return (

{userName}

{userDescription}

); } export default Main
